original_title: Chicka Chicka Boom Boom...and more fun with letters and numbers!
overview: Some of the best of the Scholastic animated videos are featured in this 3-DVD pack. Includes Chicka Boom Boom, Harry the Dirty Dog, Miss Nelson has a Field Day, lots more. Features the voices of Chevy Chase, John Lithgow, Carole King, Sarah Jessica Parker, Meryl Streep, Anthony Edwards.and more!
title: Chicka Chicka Boom Boom...and more fun with letters and numbers!
